styles.css: & { position: relative; padding-bottom: var(--wp--preset--spacing--16); } &::before { content: ''; position: absolute; left: 0; bottom: 4px; height: 3px; width: 100px; background-color: var(--wp--preset--color--primary); } &::after { content: ''; position: absolute; left: 0; bottom: 0; height: 1px; width: 50px; background-color: var(--wp--preset--color--primary); }
